fullText: The production achieves something close to miraculous: It makes you feel as if you were watching history unfold in real time, with all the tension and uncertainty that implies.
dtliExcerpt: The production achieves something close to miraculous: It makes you feel as if you were watching history unfold in real time, with all the tension and uncertainty that implies.
bwwExcerpt: The stage version...is strictly for fun. That may sound like a weak recommendation to those who wear their brows high. But being fun in period costume for nearly five-and-a-half hours of live theater is no mean achievement...But it's also because Mr. Herrin and Mr. Poulton craftily use the narrative...
